meanings.definition: Too focused or concentrated on one particular thing.
meanings.sent1: She became overfocussed on her painting, forgetting to eat lunch.
meanings.sent2: He missed the beautiful sunset because he was overfocussed on his phone.
meanings.sent3: The overfocussed student only saw the math problem, not the chocolate bar on the desk.
meanings.sent4: Her overfocussed mind was like a laser beam, ignoring everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The overfocussed detective noticed every tiny detail at the crime scene.

meanings.definition: Having too much emphasis on a specific subject or task.
meanings.sent1: The overfocussed team spent hours perfecting one small detail of their project.
meanings.sent2: She was so overfocussed on winning the game that she forgot to enjoy playing.
meanings.sent3: The overfocussed chef added too much salt to the dish, thinking it needed more flavor.
meanings.sent4: His overfocussed dedication to his work made him miss out on spending time with friends.
meanings.sent5: The overfocussed athlete trained tirelessly, neglecting other aspects of her life.
